Name: The Button Witch
About the game: Join Ellen in her quest to complete an internship for the Witch Academy and find out what happened in her supervisor's Manor! An adventure game with lots of puzzles, a retro feeling, interactive magic and a talking squirrel ghostl! - Many different types of puzzles : from escape-rooms to riddles and item combination! - Magic system : spells that interact with the enviroment, such as the 'Magnet Spell' to move metal objects and the 'Light Spell' to light up small fires or turn on lights! Unlock more as you progress with the story! - A lively cast of crazy characters with original design and personality ! - Plot full of mystery with secrets and multiple endings! - Original artwork by artist Caterina Capogrossi. Inspired by classic point-and-click adventure games and with a cartoon look that's just too cute to resist, 'The Button Witch' is an original and polished game for all ages! Don't forget to bring your magic wand! You can also find 'The Button Witch' bundled with the Digital Soundtrack: And the Artbook and Guide:
